com.ibm.webest.gui.action
Class SizingAction

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.webest.gui.action.SizingAction

public class SizingAction
extends java.lang.Object

Managed bean to store objects for sizing treetable and handle fired events like adding/deleting use cases or use case packs.

Author:
Florian Friedrichs, Gregor Schumm

delete

public void delete()
Deletes selected items (use cases and use case packs). If a use case pack is selected, the children uses cases will be deleted, too.

setNewUseCases

public void setNewUseCases(int newUseCases)
Setter for quantity of new uses cases, if the user decides to add new use cases. The value will be saved in pageflowscope.

Parameters:
newUseCases - quantity of new uses cases to add
